column4: anyone know how to build the madwifi module with module-assistant?  madwifi-source doesn't exist.
yes, you can, as long as the gui program can find an X server to attach to.
yeah just specify the DISPLAY to it

Apple makes their money selling hardware, not as much selling software.  They don't want you taking their (relatively) cheap software and putting it on somebody else's cheap hardware.  That's why they do that.
